DOC.brief_summary: Commercial ziprasidone capsules show a large increase in bioavailability with food. The formulation tested in this study aims to reduce or eliminate that increase.
DOC.brief_title: Ziprasidone Pharmacokinetics Using a Reduced Food Effect Formulation Compared to Pharmacokinetics From Commercial Capsules
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects Signed informed consent document Any significant physical or psychological disease Concomitant administration of other pharmaceuticals
